standards.title: Linear Functions
standards.description: Understand, represent, and work with linear functions in algebraic and graphical forms, including slope, intercept, equations, and real-world interpretation.
indicators: Understand linear relationships between two variables
Represent a linear function in the coordinate plane
Determine the equation of a line from different inputs
Interpret slope and intercept in real contexts
content_elements: Linear equation in the form y = mx + b
